tool_description: Predicts radio frequency coverage patterns and signal strength for proposed network sites using propagation modeling based on terrain, frequency, and antenna specifications.

site_latitude.description: Proposed site latitude in decimal degrees

site_longitude.description: Proposed site longitude in decimal degrees

antenna_height.description: Antenna height above ground level in meters (10 to 200)

terrain_elevation_avg.description: Average terrain elevation in meters from geographic data

terrain_elevation_max.description: Maximum terrain elevation in meters from geographic data

obstacles_count.description: Number of obstacles in the area

error_messages: Invalid site coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid antenna height: Height must be between 10 and 200 meters.
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be between 700 and 6000 MHz.
Invalid transmit power: Power must be between 1 and 1000 watts.
Unsupported propagation model: Use okumura_hata, cost231, or free_space.
Terrain data mismatch: Terrain elevation data appears inconsistent or corrupted.
usage: Provide site coordinates, antenna specifications, and terrain data from Geographic Data Collector. Select appropriate propagation model for environment type. Returns coverage prediction metrics.

signal_strength_dbm.description: Average signal strength at coverage edge in dBm

coverage_area_sq_km.description: Total coverage area in square kilometers
